description: This file contains Polymer framework initialization code, including component registration, rendering status management, and attribute/property serialization.

classes.name: Polymer.Base
classes.description: Core base class providing lifecycle, property, and behavior management for Polymer elements.

classes.name: Polymer.RenderStatus
classes.description: Manages the rendering lifecycle and callbacks for Polymer components.

classes.name: Polymer.ImportStatus
classes.description: Tracks the import/loading status of Polymer components.

classes.name: Polymer.telemetry
classes.description: Provides registration and logging for Polymer component telemetry.

methods.name: resolve
methods.description: Removes the 'unresolved' attribute from document body to signal component readiness.

methods.name: Settings
methods.description: Determines Polymer configuration based on URL parameters and environment.

methods.name: registerCallback
methods.description: Registers a callback to be called when Polymer is ready.

methods.name: whenReady
methods.description: Executes a callback when Polymer is fully initialized.

methods.name: _makeReady
methods.description: Marks Polymer as ready and executes queued callbacks.

methods.name: afterNextRender
methods.description: Schedules a callback to run after the next render cycle of a given element.

methods.name: _flushNextRender
methods.description: Processes all callbacks scheduled for the next render.

methods.name: serializeValueToAttribute
methods.description: Serializes a property value to a DOM attribute.

methods.name: deserialize
methods.description: Converts attribute string values back to property types.
